Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.catalog

Class CourseCatalog

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.catalog.CourseCatalog
  • public class CourseCatalog
extends java.lang.Object
    CourseCatalog stores a list of Courses for adding to Student schedules. It also allows for adding and removing Courses to the catalog.
    Author:
    Ethan Taylor

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      (package private) edu.ncsu.csc216.collections.list.SortedList<Course> catalog
      The catalog of Courses to add to the schedule

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CourseCatalog()
      Constructs a CourseCatalog and creates an empty SortedList of Courses

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean addCourseToCatalog​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String section, int credits, java.lang.String instructorId, int enrollmentCap, java.lang.String meetingDays, int startTime, int endTime)
      Creates and adds a Course to the catalog
      java.lang.String[][] getCourseCatalog()
      Returns the catalog as an array of the Courses' name, section, title, and meetingString
      Course getCourseFromCatalog​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String section)
      Returns the Course specified by its name and section from the catalog if it exists
      void loadCoursesFromFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
      Loads Courses from the specified file into the catalog
      void newCourseCatalog()
      Empties the catalog by overwriting it with a new SortedList of Courses
      boolean removeCourseFromCatalog​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String section)
      Removes a Course specified by its name and section from the catalog
      void saveCourseCatalog​(java.lang.String fileName)

      • newCourseCatalog

        public void newCourseCatalog()

      • loadCoursesFromFile

        public void loadCoursesFromFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
        Loads Courses from the specified file into the catalog
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file to load Courses from
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the file could not be found

      • addCourseToCatalog

        public boolean addCourseToCatalog​(java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String title,
                                  java.lang.String section,
                                  int credits,
                                  java.lang.String instructorId,
                                  int enrollmentCap,
                                  java.lang.String meetingDays,
                                  int startTime,
                                  int endTime)
        Creates and adds a Course to the catalog
        Parameters:
        name - the Course's name
        title - the Course's title
        section - the Course's section
        credits - the Course's credits
        instructorId - the Course's instructorId
        enrollmentCap - the enrollmentCap for Course
        meetingDays - the Course's meetingDays
        startTime - the Course's startTime
        endTime - the Course's endTime
        Returns:
        true if the Course was added to the catalog successfully

      • removeCourseFromCatalog

        public boolean removeCourseFromCatalog​(java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.String section)
        Removes a Course specified by its name and section from the catalog
        Parameters:
        name - the Course's name
        section - the Course's section
        Returns:
        true if the Course was removed from the catalog successfully

      • getCourseFromCatalog

        public Course getCourseFromCatalog​(java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String section)
        Returns the Course specified by its name and section from the catalog if it exists
        Parameters:
        name - the Course's name
        section - the Course's section
        Returns:
        the specified Course, or null if the Course was not in the catalog

      • getCourseCatalog

        public java.lang.String[][] getCourseCatalog()
        Returns the catalog as an array of the Courses' name, section, title, and meetingString
        Returns:
        a two-dimensional array representation of the catalog

      • saveCourseCatalog

        public void saveCourseCatalog​(java.lang.String fileName)
        Saves the catalog of Courses to the specified file
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file to save the catalog to
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the file could not be saved
